[`AbstractInputSuggest`](../AbstractInputSuggest) › [`limit`](./limit)

## AbstractInputSuggest.limit property

Limit to the number of elements rendered at once. Set to 0 to disable. Defaults to 100.

**Signature:**

```typescript
limit: number;
```
